root.name: Matlab X server
root.description:
Use Icy as an image viewer from Matlab.
This plugin provides an improved imshow function, called icy_imshow, to replace the default Matlab viewer by Icy. It also provides some tools to display video sequences and 3D images in Icy.
root.author: ylemontag - Yoann Le Montagner
root.changelog:
- Version 3.2.0.0 Date 2013-05-17 18:17:47
Fix: icy_mask renamed in icy_roimask (there will be icy_roirectangle, icy_roiline, etc... methods in the future, to force the user to select a certain type of ROI). Also, use the class Overlay instead of Painter.
- Version 3.1.0.0 Date 2013-02-12 16:06:00
Add: icy_mask() function, to replace the Matlab built-in function roipoly().
- Version 3.0.0.0 Date 2012-10-12 11:48:01
Add: new communication protocol between Matlab and Icy, using the Matlab communicator plugin.
- Version 2.5.1.0 Date 2012-07-10 16:11:45
Fix: Extraction procedure for .m files
- Version 2.5.0.0 Date 2012-07-10 15:39:16
Add: new functions icy_rectangle and icy_line to create ROIs from Matlab.
- Version 2.4.7.0 Date 2012-07-03 09:49:29
Fix: implement the new PluginDeamon interface.
- Version 2.4.6.0 Date 2012-06-27 16:29:55
Fix: Same issue than version 2.4.3.
- Version 2.4.5.0 Date 2012-06-27 16:05:32
Fix: Same issue than version 2.4.3
- Version 2.4.4.0 Date 2012-06-27 15:59:32
Fix: ThreadUtil.sleep() instead of wait()
- Version 2.4.3.0 Date 2012-06-27 15:54:29
Fix: same issue than version 2.4.2
- Version 2.4.2.0 Date 2012-06-27 15:15:55
Fix: bug encountered when trying to create and bind a SocketServer to an already bound port.
- Version 2.4.1.0 Date 2012-06-27 15:04:21
Fix: Deamon.run() becomes synchronous (does not lauch a Thread.bgRun() anymore)
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 13:42:28
Fix: various bugs
- Version 0.0.2.0b Date 2012-05-30 09:58:49
Fix: all the library elements in plugins.ylemontag.matlabio.*, all the common GUI objects in plugins.ylemontag.matlabio.gui.*
- Version 0.0.1.0b Date 2012-05-25 18:23:08
